title: 2008 Men's Australian Hockey League
data: The 2008 Men's Australian Hockey League was the 18th edition of the men's field hockey tournament. The tournament was held in Australia's capital city, Canberra. The WA Thundersticks won the gold medal for the seventh time by defeating the QLD Blades 4â€“2 in the final.[1] The tournament comprised a single round-robin format in the preliminary round. At the conclusion of the preliminary round, teams ranked first to fourth progressed to the medal round, while teams ranked fifth to eighth progressed to the classification round. There were 176 goals scored in 36 matches, for an average of 4.89 goals per match. 9 goals 8 goals 7 goals 5 goals 4 goals 3 goals 2 goals 1 goal Source: Clearing House
